titleStmt.title: Apostolici, or, The history of the lives, acts, death, and martyrdoms of those who were contemporary with, or immediately succeeded the apostles as also the most eminent of the primitive fathers for the first three hundred years : to which is added, a chronology of the three first ages of the church / by William Cave ...
titleStmt.author: Cave, William, 1637-1713.

titleStmt.title: Apostolici, or, The history of the lives, acts, death, and martyrdoms of those who were contemporary with, or immediately succeeded the apostles as also the most eminent of the primitive fathers for the first three hundred years : to which is added, a chronology of the three first ages of the church / by William Cave ...
titleStmt.author: Cave, William, 1637-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.C. for Richard Chiswel ...,

notesStmt.note: Title on added engraved t.p.: Apostolici, or, The lives of the primitive fathers for the three first ages of the Christian church.
"A chronological table of the three first ages of the Christian Church" (p. [299]-335) has special t.p., dated 1676.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
